title: uglysmurf
author: uglysmurf
content: Selling my IPhone 14 Pro Max 256GB Black.I used the phone for 2 weeks only but i don't like Apple. Prefer Android.The phone is as new, no damage or scratches and compleet with box and cablehttps://imgur.com/a/kEtnXWxLocation is Greece.If interested give me your best offer. Only serious buyers please!Email: george0630179@gmail.comPayment: cash on pick up or crypto.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: I assume that this time you want to meet face2face also?

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: You dont tell the price and because you are new here Use Escrow so people can trust you

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on April 16, 2023, 02:32:20 PMYou dont tell the price and because you are new here Use Escrow so people can trust youThe OP should indeed provide an opening price so that other users can be interested. If the price is right, they can bid on that price.Previously, the OP also sold the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 256 GB Black, don't know if they have succeeded in selling their goods here or not, but the post used to be that he used Android and now he doesn't like the Iphone.

comments.author: CryBuBo
comments.body: Please post your ad on our crypto advertising platform. crybubo.com .BTC
